      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Job CPU.clearCPU(int clockTime)
      Clears the CPU of the job that resides.
      Job CPU.peekCPU()
      Returns the job that is currently on the CPU.
      Job CPU.preemptCPU()
      Forces the job out of the CPU and returns the job object.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Job 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Reports to the console and file when a job arrives with respect to the current MFQ system clock.

      Reports to the console and file when a job departs with respect to the current MFQ system clock.

      Adds a job into the CPU to be processed.
